item.title: How do regional price levels affect income inequality? Household-level evidence from countries worldwide

item.title: Who is Most Affected by Price Increases? Differences in Inflation for Different Types of Household, 2020-2023

item.title: Mortality shocks and household consumption: the case of Mexico
item.description: Šedivý, M. (2023). Mortality shocks and household consumption: the case of Mexico. Review of Economics of the Household, 21(4), 1289-1358.

item.title: Illicit financial flows and country-by-country reporting in extractive industries
item.description: Stausholm, S. , Janský, P. , Šedivý, M. (2022) Illicit financial flows and country-by-country reporting in extractive industries. WIDER Working Paper 2022/76. Helsinki: UNU-WIDER. https://doi.org/10.35188/UNU-WIDER/2022/207-2

item.title: How Many of Us Can Work from Home? Evidence for the Czech Republic
item.description: Bajgar, M., Janský, P., & Šedivý, M. (2021). How Many of Us Can Work from Home? Evidence for the Czech Republic. Politická ekonomie, 69(5), 555-570. doi: 10.18267/j.polek.1329

item.title: How many of us can work from home?

item.title: Estimating the revenue costs of tax treaties in developing countries
